TextLang.Text: The hard disk cannot be accessed.
An Ethernet cable is not connected.
This operation is not available here.
A connection to the server could not be established.
Communication with the server timed out.
The chat invitation has been declined.
Do you want to cancel the invitation to this player?
Do you want to leave this chat room?
Do you want to quit chat?
The chat screen has been hidden. Your avatar will be displayed to the person you are chatting with.
%1 did not accept the chat invitation.
Do you want to leave the chat room you are currently in?
Communication with other chat participants failed.
To respond to a chat invitation, you must leave the current chat room.
Do you want to leave the current chat room? If you leave, the chat room will be closed.
%1 was not able to join the chat. Check the NAT type for this system, and then refer to the online manual for details.
You were not able to join the chat. Check the NAT type for this system, and then refer to the online manual for details.
%1 has left due to instability in the Internet connection.
Select an image that will be displayed to chat participants.

To chat with another PS3™ system user, he or she must first be added to your Friends list.
To add a Friend, first take note of your friend's online ID. Then go to [Friends] > [Add a Friend], enter your friend's online ID, and send the [Request to Add a Friend] message. When your friend approves your request, he or she will be added to your Friends list.
There is no camera connected. Connect a camera that is compatible with the PS3™ system using a USB cable.
An audio input device (microphone) has not been set. Go to [Chat Settings] > [Audio Device Settings] in the control panel and set the device to use.
You have been forced to leave due to instability in the Internet connection.
This operation is not available here. You can perform this operation only when two people are chatting.
You cannot create a chat room. You must exit from the existing chat room to create a new one.
The chat room no longer exists.
You cannot respond to the chat invitation. You are not signed in.
The operation cannot be performed. You are not signed in.
This operation cannot be performed during remote play.
You cannot create a message now.
%1 has left the room. The chat room will close.
An audio input device (microphone) has not been set.
The microphone has been turned on.
